p:
Annual climate variables at each of the 11 spatial resolutions were binned to simplify the ranges of possible climate values for analysis. We computed the 5th and 95th percentiles of each 60 m annual climate variable and removed these values as outliers in each surface. The range of each 60 m annual climate variable was determined and used to create 25 equal‐sized bins for each variable to reassign pixel values. The value of 25 bins was chosen to avoid empty bins within the range of the coarsest (12 km) surfaces for all climate variables.
